languages.text:
Ambulls can sense their targets out on open terrain. Quickly, find a solid object to stand on!
Ending turn on open ground grants a stack of {g|f:e71eb18a0b3744bc812a2094723930c6}Loose Ground{/g} unless its a Space Marine.

traits.locale_text:
Ambulls can sense their targets out on open terrain. Quickly, find a solid object to stand on!
Ending turn on open ground grants a stack of {g|f:e71eb18a0b3744bc812a2094723930c6}Loose Ground{/g} unless its a Space Marine.

languages.text:
Ambulls can sense their targets out on loose ground. Quickly, find a solid platform to stand on!
Whenever a target ends its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} on loose ground, the ambull mother immediately starts her turn, unleashes her wrath upon that target, and then ends her turn.
languages.original_text:
Амбуллы чувствуют, когда цели находятся на рыхлой земле. Быстрее, заберитесь на твердую платформу!
Когда цель завершает {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} на рыхлой земле, амбулл-матка немедленно начинает свой ход, обрушивая на эту цель свой гнев, после чего ход амбулла-матки завершается.

traits.locale_text:
Ambulls can hear targets on the open ground. Getting on solid objects is the only salvation!
Once per round, whenever a target ends its turn on the open ground, ambull mother immediately starts her turn to unleash her wrath upon that target.

Ambulls can sense their targets out on loose ground. Quickly, find a solid platform to stand on!
Whenever a target ends its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} on loose ground, the ambull mother immediately starts her turn, unleashes her wrath upon that target, and then ends her turn.

Ambulls can sense their targets out on loose ground. Quickly, find a solid platform to stand on!
Whenever a target ends its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} on loose ground, the ambull mother immediately starts her turn, unleashes her wrath upon that target, and then ends her turn.

languages.text:
Амбуллы чувствуют, когда цели находятся на рыхлой земле. Быстрее, заберитесь на твердую платформу!
Когда цель завершает {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} на рыхлой земле, амбулл-матка немедленно начинает свой ход, обрушивая на эту цель свой гнев, после чего ход амбулла-матки завершается.
languages.original_text:
Ambulls can sense their targets out on loose ground. Quickly, find a solid platform to stand on!
Whenever a target ends its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} on loose ground, the ambull mother immediately starts her turn, unleashes her wrath upon that target, and then ends her turn.

traits.locale_text:
Амбуллы чувствуют, когда цели находятся на мягкой земле. Быстрее, заберитесь на твердую платформу!
Один раз за раунд, когда цель завершает ход на мягкой земле, амбулл-матка немедленно начинает свой ход, обрушивая на эту цель свой гнев, после чего ход амбулла-матки завершается.

languages.text:
Ambullar, çürük zeminde duran hedeflerini algılayabilir. Çabuk üzerine çıkacak sağlam bir platform bul!
Bir hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunu{/g} çürük zeminde sonlandırırsa anne ambul, anında turuna başlar ve gazabını o hedefin üzerine salarak turunu sonlandırır.
languages.original_text:
Ambulls can sense their targets out on loose ground. Quickly, find a solid platform to stand on!
Whenever a target ends its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} on loose ground, the ambull mother immediately starts her turn, unleashes her wrath upon that target, and then ends her turn.

traits.locale_text:
Ambullar, çürük zeminde duran hedeflerini algılayabilir. Çabuk üzerine çıkacak sağlam bir platform bul!
Bir hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunu{/g} çürük zeminde sonlandırırsa anne ambul, anında turuna başlar ve gazabını o hedefin üzerine salarak turunu sonlandırır.

languages.text:
Los ambulls pueden percibir a sus presas si no están sobre terreno firme. ¡Rápido, súbete a una superficie sólida!
Cada vez que un objetivo termine su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} sobre un suelo blando, la madre ambull empieza inmediatamente su turno, desata su cólera sobre ese objetivo, y luego concluye su turno.
languages.original_text:
Ambulls can sense their targets out on loose ground. Quickly, find a solid platform to stand on!
Whenever a target ends its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} on loose ground, the ambull mother immediately starts her turn, unleashes her wrath upon that target, and then ends her turn.

traits.locale_text:
Los ambulls pueden percibir a sus presas si no están sobre terreno firme. ¡Rápido, súbete a una superficie sólida!
Cada vez que un objetivo termine su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} sobre un suelo blando, la madre ambull empieza inmediatamente su turno, desata su cólera sobre ese objetivo, y luego concluye su turno.

languages.text:
蚁牛可以探测到站在松散地面上的目标，快跑到结实的平台上去！
每当任意目标在松散地面上结束{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，蚁牛族母都会立刻开始回合，向该目标倾泻怒火，之后结束回合。
languages.original_text:
Ambulls can sense their targets out on loose ground. Quickly, find a solid platform to stand on!
Whenever a target ends its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} on loose ground, the ambull mother immediately starts her turn, unleashes her wrath upon that target, and then ends her turn.

traits.locale_text:
蚁牛可以探测到站在松散地面上的目标，快跑到结实的平台上去！
每当任意目标在松散地面上结束{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，蚁牛族母都会立刻开始回合，向该目标倾泻怒火，之后结束回合。

languages.text:
Les ambulls perçoivent la présence des proies qui se trouvent sur un sol meuble. Dépêchez-vous de vous réfugier sur une plateforme solide !
Quand une cible termine son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} sur un sol meuble, la mère ambull commence immédiatement son tour, déchaîne sa fureur sur la cible, puis met fin à son tour.
languages.original_text:
Ambulls can sense their targets out on loose ground. Quickly, find a solid platform to stand on!
Whenever a target ends its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} on loose ground, the ambull mother immediately starts her turn, unleashes her wrath upon that target, and then ends her turn.

traits.locale_text:
Les ambulls perçoivent la présence des proies qui se trouvent sur un sol meuble. Dépêchez-vous de vous réfugier sur une plateforme solide !
Quand une cible termine son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} sur un sol meuble, la mère ambull commence immédiatement son tour, déchaîne sa fureur sur la cible, puis met fin à son tour.

languages.text:
アンブルは緩んだ地面の上にいるターゲットを感知できる。すぐに、立っていられる頑丈なプラットホームを見つけろ！
ターゲットが緩んだ地面の上で{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を終了すると、アンブルマザーは即座に彼女のターンを開始し、そのターゲットに激怒した後、彼女のターンを終了する。
languages.original_text:
Ambulls can sense their targets out on loose ground. Quickly, find a solid platform to stand on!
Whenever a target ends its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} on loose ground, the ambull mother immediately starts her turn, unleashes her wrath upon that target, and then ends her turn.

traits.locale_text:
アンブルは緩んだ地面の上にいるターゲットを感知できる。すぐに、立っていられる頑丈なプラットホームを見つけろ！
ターゲットが緩んだ地面の上で{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を終了すると、アンブルマザーは即座に彼女のターンを開始し、そのターゲットに激怒した後、彼女のターンを終了する。

languages.text:
Ambullen können ihre Ziele auf lockerem Boden wittern. Du solltest rasch eine feste Plattform erreichen!
Beendet ein Ziel seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} auf lockerem Boden, beginnt sofort der Zug der Ambullenmutter, die das Ziel ihre Wut spüren lässt und ihren Zug dann beendet.
languages.original_text:
Ambulls can sense their targets out on loose ground. Quickly, find a solid platform to stand on!
Whenever a target ends its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} on loose ground, the ambull mother immediately starts her turn, unleashes her wrath upon that target, and then ends her turn.

Beendet ein Ziel seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} auf lockerem Boden, beginnt sofort der Zug der Ambullenmutter, die das Ziel ihre Wut spüren lässt und ihren Zug dann beendet.
